$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

ci.description: Indicate whether the test is running in a CI environment

configFilePath.description: The path to a jest config file

coverage.description: Indicates that test coverage information should be collected and reported in the output

maxWorkers.description: Specifies the maximum number of workers the worker-pool will spawn for running tests.

rootDir.description: The root directory for the project

runInBand.description: Indicates that test coverage information should be collected and reported in the output

updateSnapshot.description: Run all tests serially in the current process, rather than creating a worker pool of child processes that run tests
